results.title: Mevalonate pathway as a novel target for the treatment of metastatic gastric cancer
results.text_hl: Preliminary results from our group on primary @<m>DISEASE_Stomach_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013274 @@@gastric tumor@@@ cells indicated a similar level of sensitivity to @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ as @CELLLINE_CVCL:0333 @@@Hs746T@@@ cells (data not shown).

results.title: PILRB potentiates the PI3K/AKT signaling pathway and reprograms cholesterol metabolism to drive gastric tumorigenesis and metastasis.
results.text_hl: Taken together, our findings illustrate that the oncogenic role of @GENE_PILRB @GENE_29990 @@@PILRB@@@ in @DISEASE_Carcinogenesis @DISEASE_MESH:D063646 @@@gastric tumorigenesis@@@, providing new insights into the regulation of @GENE_PIK3CD @GENE_5293 @@@PI3K@@@/@GENE_AKT1 @GENE_207 @@@AKT@@@ signaling in @<m>DISEASE_Stomach_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013274 @@@GC@@@ and establishing @GENE_PILRB @GENE_29990 @@@PILRB@@@ as a biomarker for @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ therapy resistance in @<m>DISEASE_Stomach_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013274 @@@GC@@@.

results.title: Simvastatin plus capecitabine-cisplatin versus placebo plus capecitabine-cisplatin in patients with previously untreated advanced gastric cancer: a double-blind randomised phase 3 study.
results.text_hl: Low dose of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (40 mg) to chemotherapy is not recommended in untargeted population with @<m>DISEASE_Stomach_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013274 @@@AGC@@@.
